item.title: Time series in Tidy framework
item.description: Overview Tidyverse has been around for quite a while, however, it make one common date type unwieldy: matix. Unfortunately, matrix is what many popular times series functionalities packages based on, such as famous xts package. Most promising packages that handle time series in my eyes are tsibble and tidyquant. By no means, there is “use one or the other” relationship between these two packages. Base on the names alone, one can aware of that they have very different goals in minds.
